articles.description: Telecom Regulatory Authority of India’s 'do not call' registry has been a complete washout. However, some relief may come from penalties imposed on culprits and the new Digital India Act 2023.
articles.content: Like most people, I get on average 10-12 spam calls every day. None of them is even remotely relevant. Some, in fact, are particularly obnoxious and even insulting. Take, for instance, the repeated c… [+4122 chars]

articles.title: iPhone 14 is available for only Rs 24,599, you will not get such an opportunity again! - News Track English
articles.description: In the ever-evolving world of smartphones, a groundbreaking opportunity has just emerged, and it's called the iPhone 14. Packed with features that set it apart from its predecessors and competitors, the iPhone 14 is now available at an astonishingly low price…
